setting.location: Formal reception room in aristocratic Warsaw mansion, Congress Poland, furnished with heavy period furniture
setting.weather: Grey day visible through tall windows

characters.appearance: Beautiful woman in early 20s, blonde hair perfectly arranged, cold expression
characters.clothing: Elegant day dress of grey silk with high collar, cameo brooch
characters.action: Holding letter while speaking with finality, not looking at the man

characters.appearance: Man in early 40s, dark hair, devastated expression, shoulders sagging
characters.clothing: Fine business suit now seeming to hang loose on his frame
characters.position: Standing in center of room, hat crushed in hands
characters.action: Listening with growing despair, swaying slightly as if struck

characters.appearance: Elderly servant in his 60s, impassive face
characters.action: Waiting to show the visitor out

scene.mainElements: Formal room with woman delivering final rejection to merchant, her position by window emphasizing distance, servant ready to escort him out
scene.details: Heavy furniture creating barriers in room layout, family portraits judging from walls, letter in woman's hand (contents not visible), marble fireplace cold and unlit, fresh flowers wilting in vase, man's reflection visible in mirror showing his devastation, Persian rug muffling footsteps, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Ornate ceiling moldings, heavy curtains partially drawn, hallway visible through open door
scene.atmosphere: Final crushing of hope, social barriers proved insurmountable, cold formality of aristocratic rejection

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot showing the distance between the figures
composition.focus: The emotional chasm between the cold aristocrat and devastated merchant
composition.depth: Woman at window in foreground, merchant in middle of room, servant at door in background

lineArt.weight: very fine, built up in layers
